member.name: T:Zambon.Core.Module.ApplicationConfigs
member.summary: Represents the AppSettings.json file

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.ApplicationConfigs.Configs
member.summary: List of all configs in "ApplicationConfigs" node with the key and value.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.ApplicationConfigs.Languages
member.summary: List of languages in "Languages" already separated by ";". If no languages were informed will return null.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.ApplicationConfigs.EnvironmentTitle
member.summary: The name of the current environment.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.ApplicationConfigs.HasEnvironmentTitle
member.summary: Will return true if the EnvironmentTitle was informed.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.ApplicationConfigs.FileStorePath
member.summary: The path where the files from the application should be stored.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.ApplicationConfigs.DefaultDomainName
member.summary: The default domain name where the users with "LDAP" should be validated.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.ApplicationConfigs.ReportsURLServer
member.summary: The URL of the report server, will be used in menu options of the type "Report".

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.ApplicationConfigs.ReportsFolderBasePath
member.summary: The folder base path of the reports in report server, will be used in menu options of the type "Report".

member.name: M:Zambon.Core.Module.ApplicationConfigs.Set(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Populate the Configs property with the AppSettings.json file. Should only called when the application is starting.

member.name: T:Zambon.Core.Module.Services.ApplicationService
member.summary: The main service used in application, is registered under Scoped lifecycle.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Services.ApplicationService.AppConfigs
member.summary: Returns the current instance of the AppSettings.json file.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Services.ApplicationService.AppName
member.summary: The name of the application, from ApplicationModel.xml .

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Services.ApplicationService.AppMenuName
member.summary: The name of the application used in menu (If null will use the application name), from ApplicationModel.xml .

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Services.ApplicationService.AppFullName
member.summary: The full name of the application used in home page, from ApplicationModel.xml .

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Services.ApplicationService.Version
member.summary: The current version of the application, from the startup project Package > Package version.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Services.ApplicationService.Copyright
member.summary: The copyright of the application, from the startup project Package > Copyright.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Services.ApplicationService.LoginTheme
member.summary: The login theme used in Login page.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Services.ApplicationService.UserMenu
member.summary: The user menu array, already filtered accordingly to the available options.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Services.ApplicationService.CurrentUser
member.summary: Current active user object from UserService.

Current language service.

Expressions service.
Current active user service.

member.summary: Returns the current used instance of the ExpressionsService.

member.summary: Search for the default property from the entity type.
member.param: The EntityType ClrType to search for.
member.returns: Return the System.ComponentModel.DefaultProperty attribute value, string.Empty if not found any default property defined.

member.summary: Search for the display name of a property from a entity type.
member.param: The EntityType ClrType to search for.
The name of the property.
member.returns: Return the System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.DisplayAttribute value, string.Empty if not found the display attribute.

member.summary: Search all Static Texts using the Key property.

member.returns: Return the Static Text value string, string.Empty if not found.

member.returns: Return the BaseView object, null if not found.

member.summary: Search all DetailViews using the Id property.

member.summary: The view title, if leave blank will use the DisplayName from the EntityType informed in Type property.

member.summary: The view icon, if leave blank will use the Icon from the EntityType informed in Type property.

member.name: T:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.Buttons.Button
member.summary: Represents buttons used in DetailViews or ListViews.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.Buttons.Button.Id
member.summary: The button Id, used to merge same elements across ApplicationModels.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.Buttons.Button.Icon
member.summary: The icon should be shows along with the button.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.Buttons.Button.DisplayName
member.summary: The display name should show with the button (Inline buttons does not use DisplayName). The display name is also used to set the Title html property.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.Buttons.Button.CssClass
member.summary: Custom CSS class to use with the button.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.Buttons.Button.IntIndex
member.summary: The index value returned from Xml file.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.Buttons.Button.Index
member.summary: The button index order to display.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.Buttons.Button.Target
member.summary: The target container of the button, where the button should be shown (Toolbar, Inline, ModalFooter, Custom...). Can have more than one container separated by ",".

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.Buttons.Button.ControllerName
member.summary: The controller name of the button, if no controller is informed will use the controller from the View where is inserted.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.Buttons.Button.ActionName
member.summary: The action name this button should execute when clicked.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.Buttons.Button.ActionParameters
member.summary: List of custom parameters to pass to the action, is possible to use object properties with [ ], ex: id=[ID].

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.Buttons.Button.ActionMethod
member.summary: The action method the button should execute, by default is POST.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.Buttons.Button.BoolUseFormPost
member.summary: If the button should use the form post from DetailView, passing the entire object to the server. Defaut false.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.Buttons.Button.UseFormPost
member.summary: If the button should use the form post from DetailView, passing the entire object to the server. Defaut false.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.Buttons.Button.LoadingContainer
member.summary: Name of the loading container this button should use, default blank and will use the same from the form.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.Buttons.Button.ConfirmMessage
member.summary: If this button should show a confirmation message before submitting.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.Buttons.Button.Condition
member.summary: Condition to show this button.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.Buttons.Button.ConditionArguments
member.summary: Arguments pass to the condition separated by ",".

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.Buttons.Button.OpenModal
member.summary: The modal id in SubViews > SubModal > Id this button should open when clicked.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.Buttons.Button.ModalTitle
member.summary: Override the modal Title property set in the modal itself and in the SubDetailView.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.Buttons.Button.SubButtons
member.summary: Sub buttons list. Only used in Toolbar buttons.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.Buttons.Button._SubButtons
member.summary: Sub buttons list. Only used in Toolbar buttons.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.Buttons.Button.Targets
member.summary: List of targets set in Target property separated by ",".

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.Buttons.Button.Modal
member.summary: The modal object this button should open. Null if is not opening any modal.

member.name: M:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.Buttons.Button.CompareTo(System.Object)
member.summary: Compares the Index with other button, to sort the buttons array.

member.name: M:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.Buttons.Button.IsApplicable(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the button is application to the target.
member.param: The target container to check.
member.returns: Returns true if the button is applicable.

member.name: M:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.Buttons.Button.IsApplicable(Zambon.Core.Module.Services.ExpressionsService,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Checks if the button is application to the target and with the current object.
member.param: Expressions service to compare the object with the condition property.
The target container to check.
The object instance to compare the Criteria property.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.DetailViews.DetailView.DefaultView
member.summary: Override the view .cshtml default name from DetailViewConfiguration node.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.DetailViews.DetailView.ViewFolder
member.summary: If Views folder is organized in three levels, should use this property. {ViewFolder}\ControllerName\ViewName.cshtml

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.DetailViews.DetailView.Scripts
member.summary: List of all scripts in this detail view.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.DetailViews.DetailView._Scripts
member.summary: List of all scripts in this detail view.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.DetailViews.DetailView.CurrentView
member.summary: The current displayed view path. {ViewFolder}\ControllerName\ViewName.cshtml

member.summary: Creates an instance of the EntityType object and set the CurrentObject property.

member.name: T:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.ListViews.Columns.Column
member.summary: Represents columns used in ListViews and LookUpViews.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.ListViews.Columns.Column.PropertyName
member.summary: The property name this column should show, ex: "Name" or "Role.Name".

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.ListViews.Columns.Column.DisplayName
member.summary: The column header display name, by default will take from EntityType Property.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.ListViews.Columns.Column.IntIndex
member.summary: The index value returned from Xml file.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.ListViews.Columns.Column.Index
member.summary: The column index order to display.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.ListViews.Columns.Column.Size
member.summary: The size of the column, by default will take the available space equally, input numbers from 1 to 12 or "fit" to set to the minimum width possible without truncating the text. The sum of all columns can not be greater than 12.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.ListViews.Columns.Column.FormatType
member.summary: The format the value should be formated in string.Format pattern: {0:MM/dd/yyyy}.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.ListViews.Columns.Column.Alignment
member.summary: The alignment of the cell, by default is "Left". Can set "Left", "Center" or "Right".

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.ListViews.Columns.Column.IsNullValue
member.summary: Value to show when the column value is null.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.ListViews.Columns.Column.CssClass
member.summary: Custom CSS class to use with the cell.

member.name: M:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.ListViews.Columns.Column.CompareTo(System.Object)
member.summary: Compares the Index with other column, to sort the columns array.

member.name: T:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.ListViews.Columns.ColumnsArray
member.summary: Represents a list of columns used in ListViews or LookUpViews.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.ListViews.Columns.ColumnsArray.Column
member.summary: List of all columns.

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.ListViews.Search.SearchOptions.SearchType
member.summary: Text (Default) Number NumberRange DateTime DateTimeRange

member.name: P:Zambon.Core.Module.Xml.Views.ListViews.Search.SearchOptions.ComparisonType
member.summary: Contains (Default) Equal GreatherThan LowerThan GreatherOrEqual LowerOrEqual StartsWith EndsWith
